function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in living environments leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and compromised health for occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementation of proper ventilation systems and home automation for regular air changes.","Technologies":"Smart home automation systems, on-site detectors for IAQ monitoring.","People":"Occupants of the living environment.","Owner":"Property owners, building managers."},{"Description":"Inadequate wastewater management leading to potential contamination and spread of infectious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and public health concerns.","Mitigation":"Proper treatment and management of liquid and solid municipal wastes.","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment systems, waste management protocols.","People":"General public, municipal authorities.","Owner":"Local government, waste management authorities."},{"Description":"Presence of genetic material of SARS-CoV-2 in urban wastewater as an indicator of potential virus presence in the area.","Impact":"Potential risk of using wastewater as a vehicle for infection and spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Development of effective strategies for monitoring and managing wastewater as a potential indicator of virus presence.","Technologies":"Wastewater testing and analysis technologies, epidemiological surveillance.","People":"Public health authorities, scientific community.","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions."}]}
